ProjectTitle: Pregnancy- and Childbirth-Related Media Use to Support Maternal Mental Health
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/06/2023
Please submit an updated DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template as intermediate DMP when you start with your project

27/06/2023
You submitted a DMP using the Horizon Europe template, FWO however uses the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find this template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website where you can also find more information about the FWO RDM requirements: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan. Consult our website for more guidance on how to write a DMP for the different funders: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp
label: good with suggestions
